mapper.insert: insert into member (id_user, id_board, flag_op) values (#{userId}, #{boardId}, #{flagOp})
mapper.update: update member set flag_op = #{flagOp} where id_user = #{userId} and id_board = #{boardId}
mapper.delete: delete from member where id_user = #{userId} and id_board = #{boardId}
mapper.select: select * from member where id_user = #{userId} and id_board = #{boardId}
